overview: Do you looking for ( nebosh in india ,nebosh training in india,nebosh training providers,nebosh training courses,nebosh training uk,nebosh international diploma,nebosh international general certificate courses,nebosh igc,nebosh igc certificate,nebosh courses in india,nebosh e-learning,nebosh certificate indianebosh certificate distance learning ) contact +919895621248 The NEBOSH International General Certificate is a highly respected and recognised qualification, which will benefit organisations operating outside the UK, and multinational companies working to international standards who are seeking to implement good health and safety management across areas of their operation. Certification On successful passing the exams you will receive a NEBOSH accredited Certificate. Course Duration This course will be done continuously for a period of 12 days. FIRE AND SAFETY FORUM is an Indian registered company of qualified safety professionals. F&S F provides internationally approved trainings and consultancy services to all shapes, sizes and styles of business and individuals alike. Arbrit is India’s leader in safety trainings. Arbrit is an accredited centre by the internationally recognised professional awarding bodies NEBOSH, IOSH, OSHA and Medic First Aid. S&S F provides professionally qualified and experienced trainers to deliver high quality training in the health and safety field. Fire and Safety Forum’s corporate office is located at Cochin and branch AT ALL OVER INDIA. Regds fire and safety forum regards FSF http://www.fireandsafetyforum.com
